app_detail:
â­You can find your way easily through the best compass app. Digital compass for Android is compass free. A digital compass can be used for most of your outdoor activities such as travel, picnics, camping, hiking or boating.
â­ Smart compass is GPS compass free and starts fast. It's the most precise of all compass app and supports high definition displays. Smart compass for android is a real compass, which shows deviceâ€™s real-time orientation to magnetic fields and true north.
â­ Digital compass for Android is a tool to search bearings(azimuth) using the built-in magnetic sensors. And compass's smooth and natural rotation is looks like real compass.
â­There are many compass apps on market but most of them either work accurately when GPS is on or work accurately only in America but less accurate in Australia and Asia. GPS compass app can work accurately all over the world, as smart compass app depends on the performance of your device exactly. If it is inaccurate, please check that you are being affected by a magnetic field.

ğŸ””Features:ğŸ””
- Simple to use, use it like a real compass
- Digital format.
- Quick start.
- Stylish design
- High quality user interface.
- You can use a high screen resolution is in a comfortable way.
- Gives information on the direction.
. Shown in a different color to be seen easily the tip showing the true north.
- Coordinate accounts.
- It is not just one direction, you will also find the main and intermediate directions.
- Professional.
- The right direction information

ğŸ””Language ğŸ””
Digital compass supports the following languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Vietnamese, Indonesian, German and French ...

ğŸ””Note ğŸ””
â–ºTo run Digital Compass for Android applications, your phone needs a sensor. Please check that your phone is supported by the manufacturer. If you do not have a sensor, you will not be able to run Smart Compass and that is not our fault, do not underestimate us on the play store.
â–º Keep the device away from metal objects, machinery and where high magnetic field to avoid false results, digital compass to help you determine the direction quickly and accurately.
â–º You can move your phone in space in a âˆ figure pattern until the accuracy turns to high.
